text: Ambrish Chandra is an electrical engineer at the Ecole de Technologie Superiere in Montreal, Quebec. Chandra was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to power distribution and renewable energy systems. ==References== ==External links== * Category:20th-century births Category:Living people Category:Indian electrical engineers Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:École de technologie supérieure Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ambrish Chandra
